m_szDocTitle: 28 Electrified Vehicles, 47 Electrified Vehicle Videos (Commercials, Reviews, Etc.) | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: 28 Electrified Vehicles, 47 Electrified Vehicle Videos (Commercials, Reviews, Etc.) January 10th, 2014 by Zachary Shahan   I recently updated our “ Electric Cars For Sale ” page. I updated it in order to add in the 2014 models, but then I also ended up adding more pics and a bunch of videos. Here are the videos I just added (ordered by 2013 US sales , with new vehicles randomly ordered at the bottom): Chevy Volt Via Motors VTRUX Truck, Van, & SUV Cadillac ELR Porsche Panamera Plug-in S E-Hybrid Mercedes-Benz B-Class Electric Of course, there are plenty more videos out there.
